statements: SELECT * FROM GroceryLists;
SELECT list_id, user_id FROM GroceryLists WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT list_id, dietary_restrictions FROM GroceryLists WHERE budget <= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM GroceryLists WHERE nutritional_needs->>'category' = 'vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM GroceryLists ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GroceryLists WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY list_id DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM GroceryLists GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT list_id, user_id, dietary_restrictions, nutritional_needs FROM GroceryLists WHERE dietary_restrictions LIKE '%vegetarian%' OR dietary_restrictions LIKE '%vegan%'
SELECT user_id, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM GroceryLists GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_budget DESC
SELECT list_id, user_id, budget FROM GroceryLists WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(nutritional_needs, '$.calories') > 2000 ORDER BY budget ASC
SELECT * FROM grocery_lists;
SELECT list_id, dietary_restrictions, budget FROM grocery_lists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity, price FROM grocery_items WHERE list_id = 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, category, quantity, price FROM grocery_items WHERE price < 10;
SELECT list_id, user_id, dietary_restrictions, budget FROM grocery_lists WHERE budget > 50;
SELECT * FROM grocery_lists WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT list_id, user_id, budget FROM grocery_lists WHERE dietary_restrictions = 'Vegetarian' AND budget > 50.00;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity, price FROM grocery_items WHERE category = 'Fruits' AND quantity >= 5 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT nutritional_needs, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM grocery_lists GL JOIN grocery_items GI ON GL.list_id = GI.list_id GROUP BY nutritional_needs;
SELECT list_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM grocery_items GROUP BY list_id HAVING max_price > 10.00 ORDER BY list_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM groceries WHERE price < 10.00;
SELECT list_name, dietary_restrictions FROM grocery_lists WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, item_name, calories, quantity FROM groceries ORDER BY calories DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM grocery_lists ORDER BY list_name DESC, budget ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM groceries WHERE calories >= 100 AND quantity > 0;
SELECT user_id, list_name, dietary_restrictions FROM grocery_lists WHERE budget > 50.00 AND budget < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.id, u.username, g.item_name FROM users u JOIN groceries g ON u.id = g.list_id WHERE g.price > 5.00 ORDER BY u.username ASC, g.price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, name FROM Users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM Items WHERE category='Fruit';
SELECT id, list_name, budget FROM GroceryLists WHERE budget > 50 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT user_id, max_price, max_calories FROM UserPreferences WHERE max_price IS NOT NULL AND max_calories IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM GroceryLists WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY list_name ASC
SELECT id, item_name, category, price FROM Items WHERE price < 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT list_name, COUNT(*) FROM GroceryLists GROUP BY list_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT u.name, up.max_price, i.item_name FROM Users u JOIN UserPreferences up ON u.id = up.user_id JOIN Items i ON i.price <= up.max_price
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email_address FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM Items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM GroceryListItems GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_items > 2;
SELECT user_id, dietary_restrictions, budget FROM UserPreferences WHERE budget < 50;
SELECT * FROM GroceryLists
SELECT user_id, dietary_restrictions FROM GroceryLists WHERE budget > 100
SELECT item_name, category, calories FROM Items WHERE price < 5.00 ORDER BY calories DESC
SELECT username, email_address FROM Users WHERE dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian'
SELECT grocery_list_id, item_name, quantity FROM GroceryListItems JOIN Items ON GroceryListItems.item_id = Items.item_id WHERE is_checked = TRUE
